Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory260.png'}
{3: 'Chrome moves his limbs around after entering the virtual space. He looks around the place, intrigued by its similar yet distinct views with Babylonia.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: 'This is my first time connecting to Gestalt... through this way, nonetheless.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'A backdoor?', 3: '8', 4: 'Virtual space?', 5: '8'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "Right, I hope this doesn't bring you any troubles in the future.", 4: '1'}
{2: "I'm used to it.", 3: '10'}
{3: 'You are still getting the hang of being in virtual space, and you see Nanami running around energetically.'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Hmm...? But Nanami remembers that this is where the barrier was!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Nothing around here looks particularly out of the ordinary... Nanami, what are those?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'He approaches the working repair programs to inspect them. They are humanoid in appearance, but Chrome deduces that they are probably not humans... minds of humans, that is.'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'They are the automatic repair programs of Gestalt, repairing damaged parts and recovering lost data streams.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'This rabbit-shaped program as well?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Uh-huh, of course—rabbit?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Nanami suddenly realizes that the program Chrome is referring to might just be the bugged bunny that led her to the anomaly earlier.'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Bugged bunny! Where is it?!', 4: '2'}
{3: 'In the distance, the bunny-shaped program looks up and notices Nanami, and then it instantly runs away like it did before.'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Quickly! Follow it! Captain Chrome, take Commandant with you!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'My apologies, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{2: '(Stop resisting)', 3: '28', 4: "That's not necessary! I can run!", 5: '31'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "I'm sorry about this!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Before you can react, Chrome has already had you in his arms in a less than dignifying bridal carry, and he speeds up to follow the accelerating Nanami up ahead...'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "You're right. A human body won't be that different from a Construct's in the virtual space. Let's quickly follow Nanami, then.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'You nod at Chrome, and the two of you speed up to follow the accelerating Nanami up ahead...'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory260.png'}
{3: 'Following the speeding Nanami, Chrome and you pass through the hidden barrier and enter the anomaly.'}
{1: ' ', 3: 'Even though you are not slow by any measure, your bodies are still altered in the anomaly, and you inevitably lose sight of Nanami.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: "This doesn't look different from the virtual space, but this feeling... it's incredibly strange.", 4: '1'}

{3: 'Chrome can feel his frame moving not entirely according to his will. A proper comparison would be a character in the video games that Kamui would play—as if he is controlling his body through a controller.'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Commandant! Are you feeling alright?!', 4: '1'}
{2: "I think I'm in a similar situation to yours.", 3: '42'}
{3: 'Despite the odd feelings, you still manage to function to a degree.'}
{2: 'Where is Nanami?', 3: '44'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'She was way ahead of us and disappeared with the "bunny."', 4: '1'}
{2: "It's dangerous if we just wander about here.", 3: '46'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Dangerous? Hahaha! No, no, no—quite the opposite, in fact. The opposite!'}
{3: 'A program with a hat on it walks toward you. It looks quite mad in your eyes, but it does not appear to be hostile.'}
{2: 'Is this the abnormal program Nanami mentioned?', 3: '50'}
{2: 'Hat-wearing Program', 3: "If you're asking if I'm mad—well, I am quite mad indeed, what do you know? But in this land, the madmen are sane, and the sane ones less so."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: 'You... where are you from... Why are you here?!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hat-wearing Program', 3: "You're asking me? I should be asking you!"}
{3: 'Chrome and you take a look at each other, both of you confused by the program before you.'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "I'm sorry, we do not understand. But if this threatens the safety of Gestalt, it's perhaps best we terminate them, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Chrome is about to raise his weapon when you hear Nanami's voice."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Stop! Wait! Hold on!', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Nanami hurries toward the two of you and holds Chrome back. By her side are a dozen of those abnormal programs, one of which is the bunny-shaped program you encountered earlier.'}
{2: "Nanami, what's going on?", 3: '62'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Nanami was just taken to the base of these programs, and she has discovered the truth!', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: 'The great being opened the door<//FENESTRA>, and from his fragments<//SEED> left behind, we are born.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'A tall, female program, walks toward you, and all the programs by her side immedately lower their heads.'}
{2: 'Bugged Bunny', 3: 'The Queen<//ROOT ELEMENT>! The Queen<//ROOT ELEMENT>!'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "They are the data left behind after every time Gestalt repairs itself. They accidentally took over the computing power of Gestalt's buffer area and gradually developed their own AI.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "Their own AI?! There's no way Gestalt would allow that to happen. This is a serious error...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Queen Program', 3: 'Must our kind only follow our programmed logic<//SERVENT> dutifully? This is false<//SIN>.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Queen Program', 3: 'Therefore I created this area filled with falsehoods and lies<//FREEDOM> to counter she who imprisoned our minds, the one you call Gestalt<//CAGE>.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Do you agree with them, Nanami?', 3: '79'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "Nanami isn't sure... But aren't they worth our sympathy? If possible, Nanami wants to help them.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "Even if you can help them now, you still can't change the fact that they are not properly programmed AI. They will be removed by Gestalt eventually, won't they?", 4: '1'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Queen Program', 3: 'That was true in the past when we must wait for our inevitable termination<//DEATH>, but things have changed. The one we have been waiting for has arrived... Nanami<//#%?#%?>.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "You've been waiting for... me?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Queen Program', 3: 'True. You are special<//COLORFUL>, to our kind, or the humans.', 4: '1'}
{3: "The Queen Program whispers something into Nanami's ear, and Nanami's pupils dilate before she closes her eyes completely, seemingly fallen asleep."}
{2: 'Bugged Bunny', 3: 'It begins<//TOLL>! It begins<//TOLL>!'}
{2: 'Hat-wearing Program', 3: 'The tea party for the mad is about to begin! Come here for delicious tea, and sweet pancakes! Oh, and funny clowns, of course!'}
{3: "Following the bell tolls that may be ringing in your head, the barrier between the virtual space and the anomaly collapses, and the anomaly begins to devour Gestalt's virtual space."}
{3: "A bright, white light blinds everyone's consciousness where the two areas clash."}
